授業目的: This course examines aspects of contemporary Chinese society and culture from a global perspective. In additional to introducing students to recent developments in China, this course encourages students to explore the comparative and theoretical dimensions of current cultural and social phenomena.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will gain knowledge of contemporary China as well as skills in the comparative analysis of social and culture issues.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: While students of all backgrounds are welcome, this course aims at helping those whose first language is not English to improve on their skills in academic reading, writing, and presentation.
授業方法: Weekly student presentations, in-class discussion, mini lectures

第1回: Explanation of syllabus and introductory remarks. Classes will be conducted from the 1st week.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Students are to access all readings on the Internet by themselves. Titles and links will be provided on LUNA.
